resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81692</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81692</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>652</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Flowering Plant</string>
            <string language="es">Las plantas con flores</string>
            <string language="ga">An Planda Bláth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Blühende Pflanze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Usine Fleurissante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Planta Flowering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Pianta Flowering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ανθίζοντας φυτό</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Test your knowledge of the flowering plant. Answer questions on, parts of the plant, photosynthesis, and the different stages in plant reproduction.</string>
            <string language="es">Comprueba tus conocimientos sobre las plantas con flores. Responde preguntas sobre las partes de la planta, la fotosíntesis, y las diferentes etapas de la reproducción de la planta.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástáil d’eolas ar an bplanda bláthanna. Freagair ceisteanna ar chodanna an phlanda, fótaisintéis agus na staideanna difriúla in atáirgeadh plandaí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfen Sie Ihr Wissen der blühenden Pflanze. 
Beantworten Sie Fragen an, Teile des Betriebes, Fotosynthese und
die unterschiedlichen Stadien in der Betriebswiedergabe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Testez votre connaissance de l'usine fleurissante.
Répondez aux questions en fonction, aux parties de l'usine, à 
la photosynthèse, et aux différentes étapes dans la reproduction 
d'usine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teste seu conhecimento da planta flowering. 
Responda a perguntas sobre, a partes da planta, a fotossíntese,
e aos estágios diferentes na reprodução da planta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Verifichi la vostra conoscenza della pianta 
flowering. Risponda alle domande sopra a facente parte la 
pianta, alla fotosintesi ed alle fasi differenti nella riproduzione 
della pianta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξετάστε τη γνώση σας του ανθίζοντας φυτού. 
Απαντήστε στις ερωτήσεις επάνω, μέρη των εγκαταστάσεων, της
φωτοσύνθεσης, και των διαφορετικών σταδίων στην αναπαραγωγή 
εγκαταστάσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>652</entry>
          </identifier>

END:VCARD</entity>

          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

          </intendedEndUserRole>

          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>

          <language>en</language>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

FN:Scoilnet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
